post.title: EnerBank Is Hiring Four Positions
post.content:
EnerBank experienced record growth in 2014 and is hiring again.

EnerBank USA, a leader in the financial services industry, is offering a variety of career opportunities. Employees receive excellent compensation, outstanding benefits and a rewarding and professional work environment. EnerBank annually participates in a many community  volunteer efforts as well as sponsoring a corporate entry into the Dirty Dash each year.

Our corporate headquarters are located at 1245 E. Brickyard Road in Salt Lake City, convenient to Interstate 80 and 15. If you have the desire to be part of a team of professionals in an established and growing company, consider joining us at EnerBank USA.

Our current positions include:

  • Commercial Credit Risk Analyst
  • Business Analyst
  • Inbound Loan Process Customer Service
  • Collections Representative

To learn more about our open positions visit our careers page.
